uas.lntv.pacmangame.Maps

Class Map

  • java.lang.Object
    • uas.lntv.pacmangame.Maps.Map
  • Direct Known Subclasses:
    GameMap, MenuMap

    public abstract class Map
extends java.lang.Object
    This class is generates a Tiled Map which can be loaded onto a Screen. It provides a matrix which holds information about map dimensions and layout (Path/Wall/Collectable) This class is abstract and should be implemented as a GameMap or MenuMap

    • Constructor Detail

      • Map

        public Map(java.lang.String path,
           Assets assets)
        The constructor loads the graphic layers of the tmx-map-file and sets them up into a map-renderer Additionally it loads all graphic layers for the on screen controller (initially they are invisible). It generates a matrix of the Map which contains a Tile for each cell. It provides methods for generating and collecting Collectables which should be implemented as needed by the child class.
        Parameters:
        path - String value which contains the path to a tmx-map-file.
        assets - provide the assets manager instance of the game.

        public Tile getTile(int xPosition,
                    int yPosition)
        Get a tile by position.
        Parameters:
        xPosition - x-position of the tile
        yPosition - y-position of the tile

      • getTile

        public Tile getTile(int xPosition,
                    int yPosition,
                    Actor.Direction dir)
        Get the neighbouring tile in a certain direction.
        Parameters:
        xPosition - x-position of the current tile
        yPosition - y-position of the current tile
        dir - direction to the neighbouring tile
        Returns:
        returns the neighbouring tile

      • generateScreenMap

        private void generateScreenMap()
        This Method will generate the matrix which holds the information about every Tile in the Map It iterates through the matrix and adds specific tiles to it depending on the tile type. It gets this information from the tmx-file layers.

      • generateCollectables

        protected abstract void generateCollectables(Tile.Item item,
                                             int amount)
        Generates all simple dots/score-points which can be collected by Pac-Man. Should be implemented in child classes.
        Parameters:
        item - the kind of item that will be generated (At the moment it's only dots, but there is the option for more)
        amount - the total amount of Dots/Points generated on the map

      • countItems

        public int countItems()

      • createItem

        public com.badlogic.gdx.maps.tiled.TiledMapTileLayer.Cell createItem(Tile.Item type)
        This is a helper-method. it generates a cell with a texture-region depending on type specified. it is mostly used to generate the correct texture for Collectables.
        Parameters:
        type - specify type of the tile (exp. DOT)
        Returns:
        returns the cell for the type specified

      • generateSpecialItem

        public void generateSpecialItem()

      • collect

        public void collect(Tile tile)
        This will delete a collectable from the map and plays a sound.
        Parameters:
        tile - specify the tile from which you want to collect an item
